participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Emma is an easy-going person who enjoys simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: I like to take walks. I don't drink soda. I live in a house. I like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is a friendly and talkative person who enjoys gaming and sports.
participant_2.background: I work in the insurance business. My father is in the army. I love playing softball. I recently was fired and had to get a new job.
